channel.title: RSS Feed Exmple
channel.description: RSS is a fascinating technology. The uses for RSS are expanding daily.

item.title: RSS Solutions for Restaurants
item.description: FeedForAll helps Restaurants communicate with customers. Let your customers know the latest specials or events.

item.title: RSS Solutions for Schools and Colleges
item.description: FeedForAll helps Educational Institutions communicate with students about school wide activities, events, and schedules
